reviews.review: Very classic and up-front no B.S. love that play style.

'if I die in a combat zone
Box me up and ship me home..."
Easily one of the best all-time World War 2 arcade multiplayer shooters. 10/10
It's an okay game. It's a good multiplayer first person shooter. It wasn't my cup of tea, but it does have some unique aspects like the demolition concept. I think its a good game to give a try.

I've been playing this game since the turn of the century and it's still my favourite multiplayer FPS. Dedicated community providing updates and mods keeping it nicely up to date. If your thinking about buying, stop and just buy it.
Valve nin eski fps oyunlarından kesinlikle karakterlerin giyiniş ve silah tarzlarından ww2 yi anımsatıyo.
Pretty simple shooter, but has excellent gameplay.
um dos melhores jogos de guerra que ja joguei

Probably one of the best multiplayer shooters there is, and I think that's for two reasons. Firstly, the game does a decent job at authenticity. Recoil is a thing, and the gunplay is generally very good. Grenades will fuck you up. Secondly, the community is generally pretty solid. Ample communication makes winning a real team effort, and makes for satisfying battles.
Very Intense Game and Difficult to aim overhaul this game is still great and fun to play it may be underrated and it may be old but it's still gold.

介于闪退，希望官方修复。
游戏不错，很好玩。
人模令人呕吐 毕竟是老游戏
闪退解决办法：
打开steam目录找到DAY OF DEFEAT:SOURCE
打开目录中的 halflife2
会有错误提示，然后再返回steam库打开游戏，成功！！！
注意 每次打开游戏都需要重复该操作...
给个好评吧 希望 官方看到尽快修复！！！
Absolutely amazing game. Genius I’m ever single way. Beautiful graphics. Phenomenal game design. Essential game for anyone.

An enjoyable oldie, still filled with servers of aging veterans of the game. The gameplay is a little linear, but I still do enjoy a sniper match, or mowing down enemies once in a while. It still holds up pretty fine.
i think its ok but there are a lot of noobs with op loadouts.
Играл с немцами на сервере, почувствовал дух войны
good game too many cheaters would be good if they remade this classic.

just a great game on the theme of the Second World War. A variety of classes and weapons. two warring parties, a huge number of cards, not bad graphics issued by the engine and a pretty friendly community + a minimum of students. definitely recommend
Yeah it's really fun. If you join a local server you can have a laugh and admins always keep things under control.
Classic WWII fps. One of the best! Unfortunately only a handful of decent servers remain...

- Class cap that makes no sense. submachine mp40 , Thompson class is always full.
- Wehrmacht Kar98-Bolt rifle is ridiculously OP and Accurate. 
- American Rifle is Underpowered and is Inaccurate.

-Unbalanced maps , one sided Axis crap maps "Kar98 one shot kill simulator", camping simulator 2019.
"The problem with this is that like Counter-strike maps there is always 3 long lanes. If your rifle can't hit for shit unless you crouch and wait 3 sec compared to a Bolt rifle on the enemy team that never misses and kill you in one hit you get a one sided mess.

 "It's like playing in a AWP only server. but somehow you get a Scout in your hand with random bullet spread playing on the american side"

Have fun shooting 3 - 4 bullets with a m1 garand "American side rifle class" with random bullet accuracy in a enemy with hit registration that makes you question your aim. or ...

a kar 98 bolt rifle from wehrmacht that one shots anyone from any range with 100% accuracy  "Wehrmacht rifle class"

Buy Day of infamy instead!
Почти та же самая Day of Defeat. Игра хорошая, но в основной части мне куда более комфортно.
起源引擎重制，可惜机瞄只有拉大栓可以用。
ну это что то типо кс во второй мировой
Awesome FPS!!! I have played it for years!!!
Pasan los años y sigo jugando a esto.
One of my all time favorites ... the game play is perfect.  It never feels dated ...
Old Classic, for an old man.

Sympas de voir qu'il y a encore du monde sur DODS

отличный симулятор военных действий,оба моих отца погибли за янки,именно поэтому ставлю игре 14из88

This game is literally "Blowing Up Simulator X". If you're lucky not to die to a grenade, get your ass in a corner and pray to god a rocket launcher doesn't turn that corner.
V社包入，虽然画质和操作在现在看来很别扭，但显然在当年算得上优秀，玩了几局感觉还有着不错的可玩性，不过会被老玩家虐成狗。
Such a great game, highly addictive.
Fun game been playing it since it first came out.
Oyun aşırı zor oynamak için okadar uğraştım ki berbat bir oyun  almayın aldırmayın pişmanım.
二战 怀旧游戏   推荐大促买一个
Good balance, good maps, good gameplay and still better than modern fps games.

Что тут сказать,движок [u]source[/u] так же как и в "Counter-Strike", суть та же,убей всех врагов либо заминируй / розминируй бомбу.Только в отличие от  [b]cs[/b] тут всё оружие из 2-й мировой,так же как и скины бойцов, и карты сделаны в стиле войны.Вообщем играть можно даже сейчас, так как сервера есть,олдфаги не покидают их.  Оценка 7/10

Love the guts out of this game. Even a decade after this game was initially released you can still find full servers 24/7. If you played the original DoD (which is still playable, even with about 1/10th of the playerbase of Source) you'll love this version of it too. Pity the brits aren't in game, though.
